name: Sympatia.pl - Clean View
description:
Zmiana wyglądu strony Sympatia.onet.pl na bardziej przejrzystą:

- bez reklam,
- bez niepotrzebnych ramek,
- bez stopki

Polecam również style 24236 i style 24613
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("sympatia.onet.pl") {

div.absSlots,
div#cookieInfo,
div.sg_usersAdNaviBox,
div#topBanner,
div.clubData,
div.matchQuizStart,
div.search_banner,
div.widgetnewsTitle,
div.widgetnews,
div.matchQuizBox,
div.ma_ideaList,
div.ad_adInfo,
div.adslotWrapper,
div#becomeMember.becomeMember,
div.ad_boxright1,
div#script_bxad_slot_bxad_slot,
div#foot,
div.cprights,
div.ma_sg_boxTitle,
div.ma_sg_contactReason,
div.ma_payment_help,
div.ma_sg_androBlock,
div.ma_sympaticon,
div.ma_folders_whoIsOnline,
div.androBlock,
div.searchTagsBox,
div.ma_sg_wordsMenu,
div.sres_searchMini,
div.ma_sg_euro2012,
div.payInfo,
div.sdsPromoBlock,
div.ma_sg_adate,
div#sdsFormButton,
div.rotatePromoBlock,
div#leg

{display:none !important;}
}
